simulation.engine
Class Maximizer<T>

java.lang.Object
  simulation.engine.Maximizer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object to find the maximum of
Direct Known Subclasses:
TranslationMaximizer, TranslationMinimizer
public abstract class Maximizer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to find the maximum of a bunch of values.

Author:
Jacob Taylor
